GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object with a key of 'article' of the of the requested article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: should get all comments for an article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: takes an object with properties 'username' and 'body' and posts a new comment with associated article id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes of an article by the article's ID and responds with the updated article

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes a comment by the comment_id, returns status 204 and no response body
